message.body: What does cooper drink now? I'm a horrible aunt! I still have the rest if his Christmas present....I was in denial that you weren't coming I guess. I wil
l send it with mom and dad when they come. I suck! Sorry :( How is cupernicus?
Whole milk. You already sent enough. He is doing good. He is walking a bit. Still prefers to crawl but walks a little bit more each day.
Well I have had one thing since September! He does fine on whole milk? That's great! Weird he couldn't drink formula, must have grown out of it!
Rylan only walks now, it goes fast once they start. Still not much of a talker though unless it starts with a b. somehow dog is even bog, & boy does he l
ive his bog! Thanks for the kids gifts too, they are perfect! Can't wait for little guy to fit into his track suit
Oh good! I didn't even know he was there.
We didn't either. He just texted me last night.
That's nice. Glad you got to see him. Is his mom ok?
Yeh he said everything going well.
That's good. I thought maybe it was an unexpected trip. What does cooper eat for breakfast?
